DOC.brief_summary: This study first evaluate effect oral supplementation antioxidant combine lifestyle modification severe male factor partner couple undergo ICSI .
DOC.detailed_description: Patients underwent therapy three-month period treatment either oral L-carnitine ( 2g daily ) oral carnitine ( 2g daily ) combine modifiable lifestyle factor .
DOC.criteria: Long protocol ovulation Oligoasthenoteratozoospermic male partner ( ( count < 0.5 million/ml , Motility= < 40 % Progressive motility = < 10 % , Abnormal form > 99 % ) . Fresh semen sample . Day 3 embryo transfer Incomplete ICSI cycle Endometrial thickness > 7mm
